Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Type 2 Diabetes Starr County GWAS and Exome Sequencing
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Type 2 Diabetes Starr County GWAS and Exome Sequencing
Configuration.Description:
The T2D Seq GWAS Starr County Cohort is utilized in the following dbGaP sub-studies. To view genotypes, other molecular data, and derived variables collected in these sub-studies, please click on the following sub-studies below or in the "Sub-studies" box located on the right hand side of this top-level study page phs001166 T2D Seq GWAS Starr County Cohort.

  • phs000143 CIDR T2D Hanis
  • phs001099 T2D GENES Starr County

Header.title: Principal Investigator
Header.Institution: The University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston, Houston, TX, USA, USA

ConsentGroup.longName: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

DacInfo.DacFullName: NIDDK Central Repository GWAS Data Access Committee

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
